CustomField.description: Optional. A list of email addresses or object IDs of the contacts, leads, and users you’re sending the email to. The maximum number of email addresses allowed is 100.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. A list of email addresses or object IDs of the contacts, leads, and users you’re sending the email to. The maximum number of email addresses allowed is 100.
CustomField.label: ToAddresses
